snippet.title: Murder in the Hotel Lisbon - Just gameplay / sidequests
snippet.description:
Detective Case and Clown Bot in: Murder in the Hotel Lisbon
A videogame for Windows, Mac and Linux

This video is just a simple demonstration of a regular gameplay. Besides the main case, you can also access sidequests. These are made available by a Q that pops up in the radial menu of all the characters. You can start a sidequest at any time (unless if it is temporarily unavailable) but you can only do one at a time. The main case can be done alongside one sidequest in any order.

Coming to Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/297290/
Buy now on our website - http://www.caseandbot.com/
Buy now on Desura - http://www.desura.com/games/murder-in-the-hotel-lisbon

Synopsys:
A strange murder has occurred in the Hotel Lisbon, a man committed suicide with 14 stabs to the back while at the same time he peacefully drank his coffee. This case with contradictory facts was too complex for Policeman Garcia to solve, so he decided to hire the only detective duo in town capable of solving it: the mythical Detective Case and the unmistakable Clown Bot.

Murder in the Hotel Lisbon is a videogame inspired by the classic point and click adventures from the 80's and 90's. It adopts these eras characteristically design and it is built using only the pixel art technique. The game itself runs at a native resolution of 256x192, the same resolution used by the old ZX Spectrum 48k and most recently by the Nintendo DS.

Official website - www.caseandbot.com
Nerd Monkeys - http://www.nerdmonkeys.pt
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/NerdMonkeys
IndieDB - http://www.indiedb.com/games/murder-in-the-hotel-lisbon
